Que buen juego! :D

10/10!!

Lo vuelvo a jugar despues de años y sigue siendo epico 10/10
Play this game. Trust me, IT´S THE BEST GAME I EVER PLAYED (but still playng TF2).

Portal 2. This game has one problem, I have no idea what to play now, it completely demolished my brain into a state of mind in which no game will ever seem great compared to this.

The previous game, had two problems. 1, it's too short. 2, it has very little story behind it. Portal 2 fixes both those problems. There are three large parts to this game, 9 'chapters' as it calls it, each three chapters is longer then the first game, I took 13 hours to beat it, and, I might be a moron, but it's also awesomely long. Now the story to this masterpiece. I won't spoil it, but it explains everything. GLaDOS, How she took over the facility, why she called it hers, and why the blue robot thing is hiding under your bed. Wait, you don't have that? Oh no...

I'll give it a 9.5/10. Screw Half-life 3, Give me more Portal!
FPSの新感覚パズルゲーム！解いた瞬間の快感はportalでしか味わえない！
Troooooop bien !!!
Si tu souhaite t'enculer tous seul, buy that

This is a great example of taking a good idea and making it into something fun and dynamic. The first game was fun but short and lacked a storyline, though that didn't take away from the game. But this game not only keeps it fun, but makes the puzzels within more challenging, tells the story behind Aperture Science and gives you great characters with hilarious banter. There were a few puzzels toward the end of the game that took me a while to figure out but that's just the name of the game. Overall, great game. Not a bad thing to say about it.
Une ambiance unique. Plus qu'un jeu, une immersion!
This is great game!!!
Игра просто бомба!

I've always been a fan of puzzle games, and Portal 2 is no exception. Everything about this game is almost spot on, each puzzle is fun and unique, the characters are likeable and memorable and just AHH!!! In my opinion the second best game Vavle has created *cough*TF2*cough*! This should be in every persons Steam library because I garantee mostly everyone will enjoy it, even when you get stuck and frustrated on that one puzzle

10/10 God Like!

Очень не ординарная игра, не имеющая ни одного аналога, что свойсвенно играм от VALVe. Захватывающий сюжет, качественная проработка деталей и классная озвучка (на всех языках). Уникальная игра, в которую должен сыграть каждый. Очень рекомендую.

Simply, portal2 is an unforgettable experience. The storyline, the characters, the action you get involved in, everything is cool and worth playing. I would recommend this game to everybody  from 3 years old to 99. Original and unique.

They saw how you liked Portal, then they went and made a fully fleshed-out game out of it.

Good for Valve.

It's a solid title.

Like every title that takes place in the Half-Life universe, solitude is the main theme here.

I always feel so alone playing these games.

Some absolutely hilarious moments in this game, compared to Half-Life, which remains moody all the fucking time.

I liked this game. You can't go wrong.

It has moments of levity, deep thought, striking emotion, epic choices, and breathtaking puzzle complexity. The map makers thought in four dimensions. I was in awe at times.


*SPOILER ALERT: STOP READING NOW*


Running question: when does this story take place?

I say thousands of years after Portal 1, meaning Chell could effectively be the last human on Earth during the events of Portal 2.

Hundreds of years could be argued as well, but if solitude is in fact the main theme as always, nothing says "lonely" like being the last human left on Earth thousands of years after everything, and everyone you've ever known has died, with the exception of GladOS, of course.

Hands down the best presented game ever.  Ever part seems to work so well together.  From the graphics and sound, to the story and voice acting.  It clearly shows an experenced team and provides a lot of enjoyment.  The biggest flaw with the game is that it ends.   I want more!

Despite becoming frustrated pretty frequently throughout the puzzles, I really enjoyed this game.  There was MUCH more "story" to this game than the first Portal, while still keeping the interesting puzzles with their innovative solutions.  Getting to learn about the history of Glados and Aperture was just as exciting as the 'present-day' events that were going on.  

While I recommend everyone play the first Portal once before playing this one, I'm also certain that I'm way more likely to replay this game than the original (plus, this one is way longer).
A mentally good game that's great for people who want to get into gaming, love mindbending puzzles, and can't be bothered with FPS!
great classic game. will never get old in my opinion

One of the best games I have played over the last couple of years. Probably my best pick for 2013. Absolutely loved it. Great fun and I found it very funny at times. An improvement over Portal 1 for sure. 

9.7/10

This game is awesome, I have probably played it through six times by now. In my opinion, it is much more interesting than the first portal. The story is great, and the puzzles are very smartly planned out.
diaologe is funny the maps are puzzly

Great graphics, storyline and wonderful voice acting. The levels in this game are like riddles. At first, they make no sense what so-ever, but once you figure out how to get to that final door and hear GLaDOS call you garbage and fat, it all seems to make sense. Definitely not a waste of your, (or your parents) money. I give it 5/5 companion cubes.
fun. fun. fun.
It's a really creative game, especially good fun for two players!

Glorious. And I ain't talking war glorious. I'm talking having a physics-defying gun in your hands, solving a crap-ton of environmental puzzles, flying through the air at speeds that would make a racecar driver ashamed, AI-killing, button pressing, turret demolishing, history lessoning, going into space without a suit glorious. If you haven't heard about the Portal sries, you need to get out of whatever hole-under-a-rock you live in and GET THIS GAME.
But get Portal 1 first, that way the story makes sense.
Puzzling at times but great story.
This is an outstanding addition to the portal series

This game, unlike portal, is for people who like puzzle games and building games. or at least on pc it is. im not much of a puzzle fan, and more of the building fan. i got this game for the reason i love it, building test chambers for other people to either fail misserably at or to easily get through it and move on! great game, sure was worth it. Not so much portal, since i has absolutely no creation, yet thats just my opinion. if you like puzzles, this and portal are perfect for you.
Great plot and a lot of great puzzles definitly worth the money and time. 9/10

I can only describe this game by a quote "This is art.When you here the buzzer stare at the art."This is one of the fewest games that kept me in my seat just to complete the story.

Pese a que en algún punto se me hizo algo cansino, el juego es una pasada. Supera a su predecesor, tiene momentos de risicas, los puzzles están más elaborados y son más diversos, la ambientación está muchísimo más trabajada y el elemento de historia tiene su peso, que a  mi propio parecer en la primera entrega era totalmente irrelevante. 

Si gozaste el primer Portal, es imprescindible. Si no lo tienes, cómprate los dos. LO VÁIH A FLIPÁH, CABRONEEEEEEH

It's just great. The possible amount of variety is staggering and with the co-op mod, it's even more fun & complex! :-D

Portal 2 follows up with the same game mechanics as Portal but this time adds in a full single player campaign. Once you're done with single player there is another lengthy co-op campaign, and once you're done with that there are a few bonus co-op DLC levels included called Art Therapy. This game gets you scratching your head on how to solve complex puzzles but starts off with simple puzzles so you can get used to the mechanics and various game elements. Highly recommended, and nothing beats the feeling you get once you solve a chamber that has been stumping you for awhile. Lastly, thanks to the Steam Workshop there are an infinite amount of community made chambers waiting for you.
wow mega ;)
Jogo epico com uma historia epica, jogabilidade epica... um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei, no momento o melhor jogo da minha estante
отличная головоломка и сюжет!

This is almost better than Half-Life 2. First run took me 9 hours and the other ones took 4 or less. So I beat this game at least 5 times, because it's so good and replayable you have to do it again and again. There is also co-op and workshop, so you can download maps and even create maps with a tool they built specifically for it. Worth the price.
Great game

Un deuxième portal encore mieux que le premier, une difficulté plus élevé, des graphismes plus beau et un mode multijoueur qui entre ami et pas mal (quoi que un peu facile). Il ne reste que le problème de la durée de vie mais on prend quand même plaisir à recommencer les niveaux pour les finir le plus rapidement possible.
Just a few bucks and you get hours of entertainment from this piece of gold in gaming history! Absolutely recommended!!

Portal 2 отличное продолжение оригинальной игры  Portal. В этой игре есть ВСЕ. Замечательный сюжет, превосходный юмор, интересные головоломки и ВЕСЕЛЫЙ КООПЕРАТИВ. Все на высшем уровне, какой же крутой OST у игры, а финальная песня Want You Gone для меня стала вирусной на несколько месяцев. Компания Valve опять сотворила невероятное и создала одну из самых лучших игр всех времен.

10/10
Le top du puzzle game. Troisième fois que je le parcours...

Absolutely LOVE this game! The puzzles are challenging and make you think outside of the box (at least some of them) and the story sucks you in until the very end (That just happened!). It's great fun and the story is funny while at the same time having a feeling of dire urgency. 

The game has a ton of replayability thanks to some great multiplayer fun and of course built in steamworks support which provides an endless stream of content provided by the community, some of which are just as high quality as if Valve had made them themselves. 

While not totally perfect this game is a fantastic value for the money you spend and is worth every penny. This game reminds us that we don't need to be killing things or blowing something up to have a great time!
Best game ever I love it the end is amazing (no spoilers) i wish valve made 3's because the portal series is amazing I would recommend the portal and portal 2 pack
very oks
